name: MBlog
author: Nordvind

sections.description:
Puts a “wall” into a blog, where blog authors can chat. Wall can be hidden from unregistered users.
Intended to use in community/corporate blogs, for coordination between authors.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the archive contents to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Place widget on page, using ‘Widgets’ menu in WordPress
  4. Specify widget settings (still in ‘widgets’ menu) and click ‘save’ button. Plugin is ready to work.
sections.changelog:
0.37

MBlog becomes a live chat + some small fixes. Error reporting turned off for security reasons.

0.36

2 seconds timeout set for messages, to prevent flooding.

0.35

Unnecessary code removed. Sessions used instead of cookies.

0.32

Bugs fixed.

description:
Puts a “wall” into a blog, where blog authors can chat. Wall can be hidden from unregistered users.
Intended to use in community/corporate blogs, for coordination between authors.

upgrade_notice.0.37: MBlog becomes a live chat. Please report all problems to http://mblog-wp.blogspot.com/
upgrade_notice.0.36: Protection from chat flood (message timeout). In case of your malicious co-workers.
upgrade_notice.0.35: Sessions used instead of cookies, for security and effectivity reasons.
upgrade_notice.0.32: Avatar bug fixed, now it should display just fine.
